"Oranje": "Notifying all ARKS. We've confirmed the presence of a powerful DOLLS signal in your area."
"Our previous data tells us that it is very likely the Overseer-type known as \"Doldoris Vera\"."
"Attacks from its spiral-shaped head pose the greatest risk. When it appears, please try focusing your attacks there."
"Please make sure that you all come home without any injuries. Best of luck to you."
